s.text: Vampirism may be traced to the disease porphyria, which causes sunlight-averse skin, retracted gums, and red urine--leading to the blood-drinking myth.

Our only consensus is that "government should serve the ordinary, hard-working individual--providing safety, public goods like roads and parks and the tools necessary to seek opportunity, like education.
We lack pride in or loyalty to our government and have no "willingness to put aside personal concerns to serve a larger cause."

They were "as strong on the mound and in the field as they were at bat; endowed with a bunch of superb role players; blessed with a rare balance of speed and power; managed by a man of calming temperament."

They were "as strong on the mound and in the field as they were at bat; endowed with a bunch of superb role players; blessed with a rare balance of speed and power; managed by a man of calming temperament."
The result: a book about an Atlanta businessman caught in debt.
